EmailTemplate.name: TriCON 2012.Sneak Peek
EmailTemplate.subject: TriCON - Agenda Sneak Peek
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
STAY CONNECTED <http://www.facebook.com/pages/Tritech-Software-Systems/89416081839> Agenda Sneak Peek TriTech's Annual User Conference l September 26 - 28, 2012 Hello {{lead.First Name:default=Client}},
We hope that you will make plans to attend TriCON: TriTech's Annual User Conference <http://www.tritech.com/News-and-Events/TriCON-2012-TriTech-Annual-User-Conference> in San Diego, California.
Planning for TriCON 2012 is well underway, and we've developed our program with a focus on "Training for Today. Preparing for Tomorrow." We've put together a preliminary list of presentation topics to get you excited about the conference offerings. Click here to download a sneak peek of the agenda. <http://offers.tritech.com/rs/ortivusna/images/Agenda Sneak Peak_04242012_c.pdf>
While the sneak peek provides a preliminary list of topics, we still want your input and ideas for informative session topics to finalize our full conference program. Email tricon@tritech.com <mailto:tricon@tritech.com> for your suggestions.TriCON is YOUR conference and we want to make it as valuable and educational an experience as possible.
See you in San Diego!
Conference Details
Dates: Wednesday, September 26 - Friday, September 28
Location: Hilton San Diego Bayfront San Diego, California www.hiltonsandiegobayfront.com <http://www.hilton.com/en/hi/groups/personalized/S/SANCCHH-TTSS-20120924/index.jhtml?WT.mc_id=POG>
Registration: $695 (Early bird registration) Additional discounts available to first time attendees and groups of four (4) or more attendees from the same organization.
<http://www.cvent.com/d/8cqly7/4W>
